metadata.title: CVE-2022-3563 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Linux Kernel.Affected is the function read_50_controller_cap_complete of the filetools/mgmt-tester.c of the component BlueZ. The manipulation of theargument cap_len leads to null pointer dereference. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-211086 is the identifier assigned tothis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: bluez package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
